author: EXM7777
text:
here's the only sales training you need (and it's free):

most people think they need to read 20 books before hopping on a call

that's stupid... sales is a doing sport, not a thinking one

here's how to become a beast at closing:

>book 5 discovery calls this week
>record everything (video + transcript)
>upload to Gemini with your offer context
>ask: "where did i fumble? what would close this?"

then comes the secret weapon...

open voice mode and run mock calls

tell Gemini to be your exact prospect
- throw objections at you
- challenge your pricing
- give live feedback on your tonality

you'll spot your weak points in 3 sessions... thank me later
